titleStmt.title: A letter from Sr Marmaduke Langdale, generall of the Northerne forces: to Sir Charles Lucas: containing a cleare relation of all their proceedings in the North: vvith an hopefull assurance of a speedy relief to Colchester. After the originall copy, truly transcribed.
titleStmt.author: Langdale, Marmaduke Langdale, Baron, 1598?-1661.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
